# Ready Pixel Go

> Ready Pixel Go is Sweden's first interactive LED-arcade floor entertainment venue, located in Solna, Stockholm. We offer 45-minute gaming sessions for groups of 1-6 people with online booking, flexible pricing from 349 SEK, and multiple payment options including cards and Klarna.

## About

Ready Pixel Go is a unique entertainment concept — the first of its kind in Sweden. Our interactive LED-arcade floor lets players step on colored pixels to score points, dodge obstacles, and compete in various game modes. Perfect for families, friends, team-building events, and birthday parties.

- **Location**: Sundbybergsvägen 1F, 171 73 Solna, Stockholm, Sweden
- **Phone**: +46 76-614 77 30
- **Email**: info@readypixelgo.se
- **Website**: https://www.readypixelgo.se

## How It Works

- Players step on blue pixels to score points. Green pixels are safe zones.
- Avoid red pixels at all costs — they cost you points!
- Multiple game categories available: play 1v1 or cooperate as a team for the highest score.
- Great for teambuilding, friend groups, or family outings.

## Pricing

- **Base price**: 349 SEK (covers 1-2 guests)
- **Extra adult**: +149 SEK per person
- **Extra child (under 18)**: +99 SEK per person
- **Maximum group size**: 6 people per session
- **Session length**: 45 minutes

## Opening Hours

- **Monday–Friday**: 18:00–20:00
- **Saturday–Sunday**: 10:00–20:00

## Booking

- Book online at: https://www.readypixelgo.se
- Please book at least one day before arrival
- Arrive 10 minutes early for safety instructions
- Wear comfortable sports clothing and indoor shoes

## How to Find Us

- **Address**: Sundbybergsvägen 1F, 171 73 Solna
- **Transit**: 15 minutes from Solna centrum subway (blue line), several bus lines
- **Parking**: Available in nearby garages
- [Google Maps](https://maps.google.com/?q=Sundbybergsv%C3%A4gen+1+Solna)

## Social Media

- [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/readypixelgo_swe/)
- [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/readypixelgo/)
- [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@readypixelgo)

## FAQ

- **What is ReadyPixelGo?** Sweden's first interactive LED-arcade floor entertainment venue in Solna, Stockholm.
- **How much does it cost?** Base price is 349 SEK for 1-2 guests. Extra adults +149 SEK, extra children +99 SEK.
- **How many people per room?** Up to 6 people per session.
- **Do I need to change clothes?** Wear comfortable sports clothing and indoor shoes.
- **What ages are allowed?** All ages are welcome.
- **When can I book?** Sessions available daily, book online at least one day in advance.
- **How long is a session?** 45 minutes.
- **Is the price per person or per room?** The base price covers the room for 1-2 guests, with per-person fees for additional guests.

## Pages

- [Home / Booking](https://www.readypixelgo.se/): Main page with booking, gallery, FAQ, pricing, and location info
- [Launch / Waitlist](https://www.readypixelgo.se/launch): Sign up for launch updates and discount codes
- [Discount](https://www.readypixelgo.se/discount): Special discount offers and promotion codes

## Languages

- Swedish (primary): https://www.readypixelgo.se
- English: Available via language switcher on the website
